textArray.name: menu_olderVersion_2
textArray.text: Looks like your current save is

textArray.name: menu_olderVersion_3
textArray.text: from a newer version of the game!

textArray.name: menu_olderVersion_4
textArray.text: Are you sure you wanna continue

textArray.name: menu_option_eraseGame_header4
textArray.text: using will boot you back to the

textArray.name: menu_option_eraseGame_confirm
textArray.text: Yes, I want to start over!

textArray.name: menu_option_eraseGame_cancelConfirm
textArray.text: No way, I like my game!

textArray.name: menu_option_generateRando_flavor7
textArray.text: Placing just one more Helix Fragment...

textArray.name: menu_option_randoSuccess_confirm2
textArray.text: Yeah!!  And take me there too!

textArray.name: menu_option_ap_header
textArray.text: Write or paste the details of your session into each field

textArray.name: menu_option_assetSelect_noPack1
textArray.text: You don't seem to have any

textArray.name: menu_option_recordErase_return
textArray.text: No way, I like my game!

textArray.name: menu_option_export_header3
textArray.text: Write all save data to a

textArray.name: menu_option_import_header1
textArray.text: Import data from slot #? This will

textArray.name: menu_option_import_return
textArray.text: No way! Let me keep my data!

textArray.name: menu_option_import_mismatched1
textArray.text: Uh oh!! You seem to be

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_locked_desc
textArray.text: You haven't unlocked this achievement yet

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_beatshellbreaker_hint
textArray.text: Seek the Spherical Slinger of the Returning Shot

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_beatspacebox_hint
textArray.text: Deal a crushing blow to this Quadrilateral Quake-maker

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_beatmoonsnail_desc
textArray.text: Defeat Moon Snail and beat the game

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_beatmoonsnail_hint
textArray.text: Bring an end to your quest

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_beatmoonsnailnofms_desc
textArray.text: Defeat Moon Snail without collecting Full Metal Snail

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_map100_hint
textArray.text: So much to do, so much to see

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_items100_hint
textArray.text: It's like your shell doubles as a backpack!

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winsluggy_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game as Sluggy Slug

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winupside_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game as Upside Snail

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winleggy_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game as Leggy Snail

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winblobby_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game as Blobby Blob

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winblobby_hint
textArray.text: Conquer with the odd one out

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winleechy_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game as Leechy Leech

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_under30minutes_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game in under 30 minutes

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_under30minutes_hint
textArray.text: Snails don't normally go that fast, do they?

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_bossrush_hint
textArray.text: Looks like they want a rematch

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_findshrine_hint
textArray.text: All truths revealed... a mere two screens to the left

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_snelka_desc
textArray.text: Find the first Secret Snelk room

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_snelkb_desc
textArray.text: Find the second Secret Snelk room

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_snelkb_hint
textArray.text: They're still hiding... Somewhere pretty hot

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_remaketestrooms_desc
textArray.text: Find the Remake's original test rooms

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_mazebirds_hint
textArray.text: It's just an 8-bit craze; just a side-scroller kind of phase

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_wininsane_desc
textArray.text: Beat the game on Insane difficulty

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_wininsane_hint
textArray.text:
You'd have to be truly crazy, utterly deranged,
absolutely nutty to go for this one

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_winrandomizer_title
textArray.text: How did you get up here?

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_gravityshock_desc
textArray.text: Discover the long-forgotten Gravity Shock item

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_gravityshock_hint
textArray.text: Everything deserves a second chance, shocking as it may be

textArray.name: menu_option_achievements_progress
textArray.text: {0}/{1} unlocked.  Press {2} to show an achievement's hint

textArray.name: menu_option_quit_confirm
textArray.text: Yeah, I'm done playing for now

textArray.name: menu_option_quit_return
textArray.text: No way! I'm not done yet!

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_items_none
textArray.text:
Items will not be shuffled. Leaving this set to "None"
will leave this profile vanilla and unrandomized

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_items_easy
textArray.text:
Items will be shuffled amongst locations of similar importance
Major items at major locations, and minor items at minor locations

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_items_normal
textArray.text: Items will be shuffled to any viable location on the map

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_items_hard
textArray.text:
Items will be shuffled to any viable location on the map,
including knowledge checks like super secret rooms and shortcuts

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_progressives_off
textArray.text:
Items of the same class will appear as normal, and able to be
collected out of order

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_progressives_on
textArray.text:
Items of the same class will be rolled into a single progressive
item, granting the next-highest level of gear for each item collected

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_broom_off
textArray.text:
You will start with no weaponry, needing to go find something
to defend yourself with

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_broom_on
textArray.text:
You will start with a Broom, capable of dealing
melee damage and opening peashooter doors

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_traps_off
textArray.text: Trap items will not be generated

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_traps_on
textArray.text: Any number of trap items will be placed in the world where applicable

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_areas_off
textArray.text: You need to defeat each boss to unlock each area, as normal

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_maskedItems_off
textArray.text: Items appear with their normal sprites

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_maskedItems_on
textArray.text:
All items are shown as the same sprite,
only showing what they are when collected

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_areas_on
textArray.text:
All area-gating boss doors are unlocked from the start,
allowing full access to the map

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_helixLocks_off
textArray.text:
Boss room doors will spawn like normal,
just requiring the right weapon to open

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_helixLocks_on
textArray.text:
Boss room doors will be locked until a certain number of Helix
Fragments has been collected, viewable by walking up to the door

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_music_off
textArray.text: Game music will play where it normally does

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_music_areas
textArray.text: Area themes will be shuffled amongst other areas

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_music_full
textArray.text: Any theme can play in any location

textArray.name: menu_rando_hint_npcs_on
textArray.text:
Snails can occasionally provide the location of an item
when spoken to, but will otherwise say something random

textArray.name: intro_2
textArray.text:
[0.25]Until one day...
     [0.5]Moon Snail left on a journey

textArray.name: intro_3
textArray.text:
[0.25]Soon after...
     [0.75]the snails began to disappear
                   [1.75]one by one

textArray.name: intro_4
textArray.text:
Will anyone help?  [0.2]Can anyone
        rescue the missing snails??

textArray.name: intro_5
textArray.text:
[0.15]You can do it, {0}!!
        [1.05]It's up to you!!  Good luck!!

textArray.name: hud_collectedAllItems
textArray.text:
Item collection 100% complete!
Find the Shrine of Iris!

textArray.name: hud_unlockBossRushAndInsane
textArray.text:
Boss Rush unlocked!
Insane Mode unlocked!

textArray.name: npc_?
textArray.text: Hey {P}!  {p|0.25}Unfortunately I,{nl|}{p|0.125}snail #{ID}, {p|0.125}don't have any{nl|}dialogue to offer.  {p|0.25}Sorry!!

textArray.name: npc_0_default_0
textArray.text: I hope the next game has more{nl}weapons.  {p|0.25}This game could have{nl}used a {eff|Wave}flame whip!

textArray.name: npc_0_explainWallClimb_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!!  {p|0.25}Why don't you try{nl}climbing up the walls?{nl}    {p|0.25}Just {col|0309}hold "{ctrl|0}" and "{ctrl|3}"{col|0312}.

textArray.name: npc_0_explainLeggyFlip_0
textArray.text: {P}!!  {p|0.25}{col|0309}Jump in the air {col|0312}to{nl}channel your inner Gravity{nl}Turtle and take to the skies!!

textArray.name: npc_0_explainPeashooter_0
textArray.text: Oh, {p|0.0625}nice pea shooter!  {p|0.125}I heard{nl}you can shoot a {col|0104}blue door {col|0312}open{nl}with one of those!

textArray.name: npc_0_explainBoomerang_0
textArray.text: Wow, a boomerang!  {p|0.125}You could{nl}break a {col|0201}pink door {col|0312}open with{nl}just one of those!

textArray.name: npc_0_explainRainbowWave_0
textArray.text: Is that a rainbow wave!?  {p|0.25}Well,{nl}then!  {p|0.25}You can open a {col|0111}red door{col|0312}{nl}with one of those!

textArray.name: npc_0_explainDevastator_0
textArray.text: {sfx|1}A {eff|Shake}devastator!?  {eff|None}{sfx|0}{p|0.4}That opens up{nl}{col|0207}green doors!  {p|0.25}{col|0312}It also upgrades{nl}all three weapons!  Wow!!

textArray.name: npc_1_default_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.125}you missed it!  {p|0.25}I made a{nl}delicious pizza, {p|0.125}and I ate the{nl}whole {p|0.125}thing!!!  {p|0.3}{sfx|2}{eff|Wave}{spd|0.04}Om nom nom!

textArray.name: npc_1_promptStory_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.125}some snails are missing!{p|0.25}{nl}Do you think you could go look{nl}for them?  {p|0.25}I'm getting worried!

textArray.name: npc_1_smallTalk_0
textArray.text: I have a goal in life.  {p|0.25}One day,{nl}I will eat a pizza.  {p|0.4}I mean it!!{p|0.4}{spd|0.06}{nl}Just you watch, {p|0.0625}{P}!!

textArray.name: npc_2_default_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you having 18,000,000{nl}baby {SS}!!  {p|0.25}{eff|Wave}Congratulations!!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictPeashooter_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you finding a weapon{nl}somewhere under the water!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictShellbreaker_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you heading to the upper{nl}right part of the map!!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictBoomerang_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the past, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you forgot to grab the{nl}boomerang after Shellbreaker!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictStompy_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you heading to the lower{nl}right part of the map!!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictRainbowWave_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the past, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you forgot to grab the{nl}rainbow wave after Stompy!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictSpaceBox_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you heading to the lower{nl}left part of the map!!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictRapidFire_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the past, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you forgot to grab the{nl}rapid fire before Space Box!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictMoonSnail_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you heading to the upper{nl}left part of the map!!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictHelixFragments_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you heading all over the{nl}map, finding little shells!

textArray.name: npc_2_rando_0
textArray.text: Yeah, {p|0.25}I have no idea what's going{nl}on here.  {p|0.4}You're on your own, {nl}{P}!

textArray.name: npc_2_predictIris_0
textArray.text: {col|0303}I can see the future, {P}!{col|0312}{p|0.3}{nl}I see you heading precisely two{nl}screens to the left of here!!

textArray.name: npc_3_default_0
textArray.text: Oh, my, {p|0.125}you're a {col|0301}full metal{nl}{S}{col|0312}!{p|0.25} You must be really good{nl}at crawling around ceilings!!

textArray.name: npc_3_cantCorner_0
textArray.text: I wonder why I can't crawl on{nl}ceiling corners...  {p|0.25}Do you think{nl}I'll ever be able to, {P}?

textArray.name: npc_3_admireGravity_0
textArray.text: Oh, my, {p|0.125}you're a {col|0204}gravity {S}{col|0312}!{p|0.25}{nl}You must be really good at{nl}crawling around ceilings!!

textArray.name: npc_4_default_0
textArray.text: {eff|Wave}Whew!  {eff|None}{p|0.25}Thanks, {P}!  {p|0.125}I think{nl}those blocks were planning to{nl}attack!!  {p|0.125}You saved the day!!

textArray.name: npc_4_greenBlock_0
textArray.text: I wish I had some way to break{nl}green blocks.  {p|0.125}Those suckers{nl}are always getting in my way!!

textArray.name: npc_5_default_0
textArray.text: They say {col|0311}Boss Rush {col|0312}is the{nl}true test of snail skill.{p|0.3}{nl}{spd|0.04}But what about slug skill?

textArray.name: npc_5_secrets_0
textArray.text: There's a lot of secrets{nl}in and around Snail Town.{p|0.25}{nl}Have you found them all?

textArray.name: npc_6_default_0
textArray.text: Hey {P}, {p|0.125}how'd you get up{nl}here?  {p|0.4}And how do I get down?

textArray.name: npc_6_treehouses_0
textArray.text: Don't you think it's weird that{nl}we all live in treehouses?

textArray.name: npc_7_default_0
textArray.text: Snail Town is safe again,{p|0.125}{nl}thanks to you, {p|0.125}{P}!

textArray.name: npc_7_save_0
textArray.text: Are you leaving town, {P}?{p|0.25}{nl}Well,{p|0.125} be careful!  {p|0.25}Make sure{nl}you {col|0206}save your game often{col|0312}!!

textArray.name: npc_7_boomerang_0
textArray.text: Ooh, {p|0.125}boomerangs!  {p|0.25}If I had{nl}those, {p|0.125}I'd try breaking the{nl}ceiling over the save spot!

textArray.name: npc_7_rainbowWave_0
textArray.text: Rainbows are so pretty!{nl}{p|0.125}Don't you think so, {P}?

textArray.name: npc_7_scared_0
textArray.text: I'm scared, {P}!{p|0.25}{nl}Is {col|0204}Moon Snail {col|0312}going to take{nl}me away like the others?

textArray.name: npc_8_default_0
textArray.text: I {p|0.125}{eff|Shake}knew {p|0.125}{eff|None}there was something{nl}weird about that tree!!

textArray.name: npc_9_default_0
textArray.text: It's so cozy in here!  {p|0.25}I just{nl}{p|0.125}{eff|Wave}{spd|0.06}love {p|0.125}{eff|None}{spd|0.02}my little underground{nl}home!

textArray.name: npc_9_dirtHome_0
textArray.text: The other snails live in houses,{p|0.125}{nl}but I like it here in the dirt.{p|0.25}{nl}Isn't it nice in here?

textArray.name: npc_11_default_0
textArray.text: Don't forget!{nl}{p|0.15}Press {col|0309}"{ctrl|9}" {col|0312}to shoot your{nl}weapon at stuff!!

textArray.name: npc_11_explainPeashooter_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.125}it's dangerous to go{nl}alone!  {p|0.15}Take this Pea Shooter!{nl}{p|0.3}Press {col|0309}"{ctrl|9}" {col|0312}to shoot with it!!

textArray.name: npc_11_rando_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.125}it's dangerous to go{nl}alone!  {p|0.15}Take this item!{nl}{p|0.3}I'm sure it'll be useful!

textArray.name: npc_12_funBlocks_0
textArray.text: Heya, {P}! {p|0.125}I filled the heart{nl}container over there with some{nl}fresh slime! {p|0.25}Enjoy!!

textArray.name: npc_13_default_0
textArray.text: {eff|Wave}Wow!  {eff|None}{p|0.25}It looks like you've{nl}found {col|0302}##% {col|0312}of the items in this{nl}game!  {p|0.25}Nice going, {P}!

textArray.name: npc_14_default_0
textArray.text: Wow, {P}!  {p|0.125}You're pretty good{nl}at finding secrets!  {p|0.25}Maybe you{nl}should become a detective!

textArray.name: npc_14_helixFragments_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}!  {p|0.25}Keep an eye out{nl}for {col|0302}"Helix Fragments"{col|0312}.  {p|0.25}They{nl}look like spinning white shells!

textArray.name: npc_14_shrine_0
textArray.text: They say that the {col|0302}Shrine of{nl}Iris {col|0312}is not located on any map!

textArray.name: npc_15_default_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me tell you a{nl}secret: {p|0.125}there's a secret{nl}somewhere in the main menu!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintSecret_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me give you a{nl}hint: {p|0.125}Come back to town after{nl}each area to find secret items!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintSnaily_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me give you a{nl}little hint: {p|0.125}A shell can fit{nl}where a snail cannot!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintSluggy_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Here's a li'l hint:{p|0.125}{nl}{SS} may be more fragile than{nl}snails, {p|0.125}but they're also faster!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintUpside_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me give you a{nl}little hint: {p|0.125}A shell can fit{nl}where a snail cannot!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintLeggy_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Here's a tip: {p|0.125}It may{nl}look too big, {p|0.125}but your shell{n}can fit in places ours can!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintBlobby_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Here's a little tip:{p|0.125}{nl}You don't have to be on the{nl}ground to jump!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintLeechy_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Here's a li'l hint:{p|0.125}{nl}{SS} may be more fragile than{nl}snails, {p|0.125}but they're also faster!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintMissedSecret_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me give you a{nl}hint: {p|0.125}Sometimes, you'll miss a{nl}secret if you cling to a wall!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintEarlyHighJump_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me give you a{nl}hint: {p|0.125}You can find the "high{nl}jump" before any other item!

textArray.name: npc_15_hintSSB_0
textArray.text: Hi, {P}!  {p|0.125}Let me tell you a{nl}secret: {p|0.125}There's a boomerang{nl}somewhere in Snail Town!

textArray.name: npc_16_healTipGeneric_0
textArray.text: If you ever get hurt, {p|0.125}{col|0207}eat some{nl}plants{col|0312}!  {p|0.25}You need to eat well{nl}to stay fit and healthy!

textArray.name: npc_16_healTipLeechy_0
textArray.text: If you ever get hurt, {p|0.125}defeat{nl}enemies!  {p|0.25}As a leech, {p|0.125}you can{nl}earn {col|0201}pink heath orbs {col|0312}off them!

textArray.name: npc_16_ride_0
textArray.text: I want to go for a ride!!!

textArray.name: npc_17_default_0
textArray.text: They call me {col|0209}upside-down snail{col|0312},{p|0.25}{nl}but I think everyone else is{nl}upside down!

textArray.name: npc_17_secret_0
textArray.text: There's a hidden room under the{nl}path into town.  {p|0.25}I don't know{nl}how to get in yet, though...

textArray.name: npc_18_default_0
textArray.text: You found the {eff|Wave}super secret{nl}boomerang!  {eff|None}{p|0.125}Way to go!{p|0.25}{nl}Press {col|0309}"{ctrl|9}" {col|0312}to shoot with it!

textArray.name: npc_18_remindShoot_0
textArray.text: Don't forget!{p|0.25}{nl}Press {col|0309}"{ctrl|9}" {col|0312}to shoot your{nl}weapon at stuff!!

textArray.name: npc_19_boomerang_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}! {p|0.25}If you had a{nl}boomerang, {p|0.125}you could break{nl}all sorts of walls!

textArray.name: npc_20_secret_0
textArray.text: There's some kind of secret{nl}passage to the right, {p|0.1}but I'm{nl}not sure how to get through...

textArray.name: npc_20_findSnails_0
textArray.text: I hope you can find all the{nl}other snails!  {p|0.2}They're not all{nl}as brave as me, you know!!

textArray.name: npc_21_default_0
textArray.text: By the way, {p|0.1}you can switch{nl}weapons by {col|0309}pressing inputs{nl}like "{ctrl|11}" and "{ctrl|12}"{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_21_default_1
textArray.text: If you're using a controller,{nl}{p|0.15}you can {col|0309}use {ctrl|4}{ctrl|5}{ctrl|6}{ctrl|7} to aim your{nl}weapon while moving around{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_21_boomerang_0
textArray.text: Yay, {P}, it's you!! {nl}{p|0.2}Take this boomerang and break{nl}some walls open!!

textArray.name: npc_21_rando_0
textArray.text: {P}, it's you!! {nl}{p|0.2}That door's been locking me in{nl}here for far too long.  {p|0.2}Thanks!!

textArray.name: npc_23_loadGame_0
textArray.text: Hey, {p|0.125}if you get stuck, {p|0.125}just hit{nl}{col|0309}{ctrl|17} {col|0312}and load your game from{nl}town!  {p|0.125}You won't lose any items!

textArray.name: npc_24_default_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.125}legend says the{nl}{col|0302}Shrine of Iris {col|0312}is somewhere{nl}very close to Snail Town!!

textArray.name: npc_24_offerHelixFragment_0
textArray.text: Take this {col|0302}Helix Fragment{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}Legend says it is but one{nl}piece of {col|0302}Iris, the Godsnail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_24_rando_0
textArray.text: I heard that some doors in the{nl}world can only be opened with{nl}small amounts of {col|0302}Iris{col|0312}' power!

textArray.name: npc_25_default_0
textArray.text: Hey {P}, {p|0.125}I'm hungry!  {p|0.25}Know{nl}any good plants around town?

textArray.name: npc_25_explainMap_0
textArray.text: Have you tried hitting {col|0309}"{ctrl|16}"{col|0312}{nl}yet?  {p|0.25}It makes the map big!  {p|0.25}Oh,{nl}{p|0.125}and hit {col|0309}"{ctrl|17}" {col|0312}for the menu!

textArray.name: npc_26_default_0
textArray.text: With this "Shell Shield", {p|0.1}you{nl}won't take any damage when you{nl}hide in your shell!

textArray.name: npc_26_blobby_0
textArray.text: Take this "Shelmet"! {p|0.25}You{nl}can hide in it to avoid{nl}taking damage!

textArray.name: npc_26_offerRando_0
textArray.text: Here, take this{spd|0.12}... {p|0.25}{spd|0.02}thing!  {p|0.3}{nl}I'm not sure what it is, {p|0.25}but{nl}surely it's helpful!  {p|0.5}Right?

textArray.name: npc_26_emptyRando_0
textArray.text: I'll be honest, {p|0.15}it's kinda{nl}cold in here.

textArray.name: npc_27_default_0
textArray.text: Watch out, {P}!  {p|0.25}Without the{nl}"{col|0305}Ice {S}{col|0312}" power, {p|0.15}the area{nl}ahead will be too difficult!

textArray.name: npc_27_icyPlayer_0
textArray.text: Oh, {P}, {p|0.15}you're an {col|0305}Ice {S}{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}That means the icicles in the{nl}room ahead won't hurt you!

textArray.name: npc_28_default_0
textArray.text: Oh, {P}, it's you!!  {p|0.15}I'm saved!!{nl}{p|0.2}{col|0204}Moon Snail {col|0312}took me here!  {p|0.15}He's{nl}gone bad, {P}!!

textArray.name: npc_28_gravSnail0_0
textArray.text: {P}, you can {col|0207}gravity jump{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}{col|0309}Jump in the air, {p|0.1}then hold any{nl}direction and press jump again{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_28_gravSnail1_0
textArray.text: {P}, you can {col|0207}gravity jump{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}{col|0309}Jump, {p|0.1}then hold the jump{nl}button and press any direction{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_28_gravSnail2_0
textArray.text: {P}, you can {col|0207}gravity jump{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}{col|0309}Jump in the air, {p|0.1}then double-tap{nl}any direction{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_28_magneticFoot_0
textArray.text: {P}, you're a {col|0211}magnet snail{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}You can {col|0309}round ceiling corners{nl}with no problem{col|0312}!  {p|0.2}Lucky you!!

textArray.name: npc_28_corkscrewJump_0
textArray.text: {P}, you can {col|0209}corkscrew jump{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}Now you can {col|0309}flip multiple times{nl}before hitting the ground{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_28_angelJump_0
textArray.text: {P}, you're an {col|0302}angelblob{col|0312}!  {p|0.25}{nl}You can {col|0309}jump a few times mid-air{nl}before hitting the ground{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_29_default_0
textArray.text: Don't worry about me, {P}!{nl}{p|0.25}I'm an {col|0305}Ice Snail{col|0312}, {p|0.15}so these ice{nl}guys and icicles can't hurt me!

textArray.name: npc_29_insane_0
textArray.text: Oh, no!! {p|0.2}{P}!! {p|0.2}The "{col|0305}Ice {S}{col|0312}"{nl}power-up is missing on insane{nl}mode! {p|0.25}Good luck without it!!

textArray.name: npc_30_default_0
textArray.text: Congratulations, {P}!!  {p|0.2}{col|0204}Moon{nl}Snail {col|0312}is saved!!  {p|0.4}Wait, {p|0.2}is he a{nl}moon snail or a sun snail?

textArray.name: npc_30_underpowered_0
textArray.text: Be careful, {P}!  {p|0.25}With only{nl}the powers you have now, {col|0204}Moon{nl}Snail {col|0312}will eat you for lunch!!

textArray.name: npc_30_warnAboutMoonSnail_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.1}{col|0204}Moon Snail's {col|0312}just ahead!{nl}{p|0.2}He brought us here!!  {p|0.15}He's gone{nl}bad!!  {p|0.15}You need to defeat him!!

textArray.name: npc_31_default_0
textArray.text: Don't moon snails live in the{nl}ocean?  {p|0.25}{eff|Shake}{sfx|3}HEY, {p|0.2}{eff|None}{sfx|0}THIS GAME ISN'T{nl}REALISTIC!!  {p|0.2}WHAT GIVES??

textArray.name: npc_31_discussMoonSnail_0
textArray.text: {col|0204}Moon Snail {col|0312}is still a snail!!  {p|0.2}He{nl}was once known as {col|0309}Sun Snail{col|0312}{nl}and enjoyed nomming on grass!!

textArray.name: npc_31_helixFragments_0
textArray.text: I've heard that the {col|0302}Shrine of{nl}Iris {col|0312}is not marked on any map!{nl}{p|0.25}Have you found it yet?

textArray.name: npc_32_default_0
textArray.text: Amazing work, {P}!!  {p|0.5}Hey,{nl}{p|0.25}how'd we get into outer space,{nl}anyway?

textArray.name: npc_32_underpowered_0
textArray.text: Watch out, {P}!  {p|0.2}You're not{nl}strong enough to fight {col|0204}Moon{nl}Snail {col|0312}yet!!  {p|0.15}Turn back!!

textArray.name: npc_32_noIris_0
textArray.text: If only you had the power of{nl}{col|0302}Iris!  {col|0312}{p|0.2}She could restore his{nl}light once he's defeated!!

textArray.name: npc_32_poweredIris_0
textArray.text: Use the power of {col|0302}Iris{col|0312}, {P}!{nl}{p|0.2}Defeat {col|0204}Moon Snail{col|0312}, and restore{nl}him to his former light!

textArray.name: npc_32_helixFragments_0
textArray.text: There are 30 {col|0302}fragments {col|0312}hidden{nl}around Snaily World!  {p|0.15}Good luck{nl}finding them, {P}!!

textArray.name: npc_33_offerHeart_0
textArray.text: {P}, take this heart!  {p|0.1}You'll{nl}need all the help you can get{nl}to defeat {col|0204}Moon Snail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_33_offerHeart_0
textArray.text: {P}, take this heart!  {p|0.1}You'll{nl}need all the help you can get{nl}to defeat {col|0204}Moon Snail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_33_offerRando_0
textArray.text: {P}, take this item!  {p|0.1}You'll{nl}need all the help you can get{nl}to defeat {col|0204}Moon Snail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_34_findFragments_0
textArray.text: {P}, {p|0.15}search for the {col|0302}Helix{nl}Fragments{col|0312}!  {p|0.25}Once you have them{nl}all, {p|0.15}find the {col|0302}Shrine of Iris{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_36_default_0
textArray.text: Heya, {P}!  {p|0.15}{col|0209}Gravity Shock{col|0312}{nl}upgrades your {col|0207}gravity jump{col|0312}!{nl}{p|0.25}Pretty neat, huh?

textArray.name: npc_36_default_1
textArray.text: While falling, {p|0.2}{col|0309}gravity jump in{nl}the same direction you're falling {col|0312}{nl}to unleash a powerful attack!!

textArray.name: npc_36_rando_0
textArray.text: I don't get many visitors out{nl}here.  {p|0.25}Admittedly, it gets kinda{nl}lonely.  {p|0.3}Thanks for stopping by.

textArray.name: npc_37_default_0
textArray.text: Where are we, {P}?  {p|0.2}Do you{nl}think they put this room in{nl}on purpose?

textArray.name: npc_38_thank_0
textArray.text: {P}, thank you for helping{nl}me!  {p|0.3}Now I can get back to my{nl}hobby: {p|0.25}collecting prime numbers!

textArray.name: npc_39_noFragments_0
textArray.text: Hello, {P}!  {p|0.2}I am {col|0302}Iris, the{nl}Godsnail{col|0312}.  {p|0.25}But without the {col|0302}Helix{nl}Fragments{col|0312}, {p|0.15}I am powerless...

textArray.name: npc_39_oneFragment_0
textArray.text: Hello, {P}!  {p|0.2}I am {col|0302}Iris, the{nl}Godsnail{col|0312}.  {p|0.25}But with only 1 {col|0302}Helix{nl}Fragment{col|0312}, {p|0.15}I am powerless...

textArray.name: npc_39_someFragments_0
textArray.text: Hello, {P}!  {p|0.2}I am {col|0302}Iris, the{nl}Godsnail{col|0312}.  {p|0.25}But with only {Helix} {col|0302}Helix{nl}Fragments{col|0312}, {p|0.15}I am powerless...

textArray.name: npc_39_mostFragments_0
textArray.text: I can feel my power returning!{nl}{p|0.25}With {HelixLeft} more {col|0302}Helix Fragments{col|0312},{nl}{p|0.15}perhaps we can save {col|0204}Moon Snail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_39_almostAllFragments_0
textArray.text: I can feel my power returning!{nl}{p|0.25}With 1 more {col|0302}Helix Fragment{col|0312},{nl}{p|0.15}perhaps we can save {col|0204}Moon Snail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_39_allFragments_0
textArray.text: My power has returned!  {p|0.25}Now go,{nl}{p|0.1}{P}, {p|0.15}and defeat {col|0204}Moon Snail!{col|0312}{nl}{p|0.25}My power will restore him!

textArray.name: npc_39_restoredSun_0
textArray.text: Congratulations, {P}! {p|0.25}Thanks{nl}to you, {col|0204}Moon Snail {col|0312}is restored,{nl}{p|0.15}and is now the {col|0309}Sun Snail{col|0312}!

textArray.name: npc_40_warnAboutStompy_0
textArray.text: Be careful, {P}!!  {p|0.25}I've heard{nl}some {eff|Shake}{spd|0.06}scary stuff {eff|None}{spd|0.02}happening in{nl}the next room!!

textArray.name: npc_41_warnAboutSB_0
textArray.text: Watch out, {P}!!{nl}{p|0.25}A {col|0200}fierce monster {col|0312}is hiding{nl}in the next room!!

textArray.name: npc_41_greyDoor_0
textArray.text: Oh hey, {p|0.15}that {col|0212}grey door {col|0312}below{nl}and to the left opened up!{nl}{p|0.3}I wonder what's inside?

textArray.name: npc_41_babySnails_0
textArray.text: Good luck, {P}!  {p|0.15}I'll wait{nl}here for you!!  {p|0.25}Let's have lots{nl}of baby snails later, okay?

textArray.name: npc_42_default_0
textArray.text: What?  {p|0.15}There was a {col|0200}monster{nl}{col|0312}in the next room??  {p|0.25}Are you{nl}trying to scare me, {P}??

textArray.name: npc_42_noRapidFire_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}!  {p|0.15}I heard a rumor{nl}that the next room is too hard{nl}without "{col|0209}Rapid Fire{col|0312}"!!

textArray.name: npc_42_pinkGrass_0
textArray.text: {col|0204}Moon Snail {col|0312}brought me here!{nl}{p|0.15}Isn't he nice?  {p|0.15}{eff|Wave}All the {col|0201}pink{nl}grass {col|0312}I could ever eat!!

textArray.name: npc_43_default_0
textArray.text: Ooh, {P}, {p|0.15}can you crawl{nl}around ceiling corners now??{p|0.4}{nl}I wish I were a Gravity Snail!

textArray.name: npc_43_cantCorner_0
textArray.text: I can't seem to crawl around{nl}these corners! {p|0.3}I wonder if{nl}I'll ever be able to do it...

textArray.name: npc_43_upside_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}, {p|0.2}how do you manage{nl}to fall up?? {p|0.4}You're not even a{nl}Gravity Snail!! {p|0.4}{eff|Shake}How do you do it?!

textArray.name: npc_43_leggy_0
textArray.text: You're so lucky, {P}! {p|0.2}You don't{nl}have to deal with corners!!{nl}{p|0.6}{spd|0.25}...{spd|0.02}How do you flip though?

textArray.name: npc_43_blobby_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}! {p|0.2}How do you treat{nl}corners? {p|0.3}Can you crawl like us?{nl}{p|0.4}I wanna know more about blobs!!

textArray.name: npc_45_default_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}!  {p|0.15}If you grab the{nl}{col|0301}powerup {col|0312}ahead, {p|0.1}you'll only take{nl}half damage from enemies!!

textArray.name: npc_45_fullMetal_0
textArray.text: Ooh, a {col|0301}Full Metal {S}{col|0312}!  {p|0.2}Now{nl}you're as tough as iron, {p|0.1}and as{nl}quick as Mercury!

textArray.name: npc_45_nonNeutonian_0
textArray.text: Ooh, a {col|0211}Non-Neutonian {S}{col|0312}! {p|0.2}{nl}The perfect blend of fluidity{nl}and indestructibility!!

textArray.name: npc_45_offerRando_0
textArray.text: There's a powerup ahead, {P}!{nl}{p|0.2}Why don't you take it?

textArray.name: npc_46_default_0
textArray.text: {col|0111}Walleyes {col|0312}can't hurt you, {P}!{p|0.25}{nl}You can just crawl right past{nl}them, {p|0.1}right on the same wall!

textArray.name: npc_47_default_0
textArray.text: So many {col|0210}secret snelks!  {p|0.15}{col|0312}Have{nl}you found the other {col|0210}secret{nl}snelk {col|0312}room yet?  {p|0.2}_@_v!!

textArray.name: npc_50_default_0
textArray.text: Have you tried {col|0309}hitting{nl}"{ctrl|10}" {col|0312} yet?  {p|0.15}It lets you{nl}shoot while holding still!

textArray.name: npc_51_admireRainbowWave_0
textArray.text: {eff|Wave}Woah!!  {p|0.25}{eff|None}Nice Rainbow Wave, {P}!!{p|0.25}{nl}I'd love one too, {p|0.125}but I don't{nl}have a jump button.

textArray.name: npc_52_default_0
textArray.text: Hey there, {P}!! {p|0.25}I see you{nl}figured out how to start a{nl}multi-page conversation!

textArray.name: npc_52_default_1
textArray.text: The hope is this talk should go{nl}100% smoothly. {p|0.125}What do you{nl}think?

textArray.name: npc_52_default_2
textArray.text: Impressive! {p|0.25}I do hope that's my{nl}portrait showing right now, {p|0.125}if it{nl}even is there.

textArray.name: npc_52_default_3
textArray.text: I'm here to test multiple things,{nl}it seems!

textArray.name: npc_53_default_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}!  {p|0.25}Seems you've found{nl}an unfinished area.  {p|0.15}Not much{nl}going on in here right now.

textArray.name: npc_53_greeting
textArray.text: So glad you could make it! {nl}{p|0.25}C'mon, {p|0.15}I have something to show{nl}you!!

textArray.name: npc_53_introduce
textArray.text: Watch the statue, {P}!  {p|0.15}I'm{nl}gonna decorate it with the flip{nl}of a switch!

textArray.name: npc_53_postScene_0
textArray.text: Y'know, {p|0.1}now that I think about{nl}it... {p|0.15}would this freeze over the{nl}rooms around us?  {p|0.2}I hope not!

textArray.name: npc_54_default_0
textArray.text: Idk how I'm saying this I'm not{nl}supposed to be talking right now.

textArray.name: npc_55_default_0
textArray.text: The test subject looks just{nl}like me...{p|0.5}{nl}I think I feel a connection...

textArray.name: npc_55_second_0
textArray.text: "Not tile"...{p|0.5}{nl}I'm not a tile either, am I,{nl}{P}?

textArray.name: npc_56_default_0
textArray.text: After this game is over, {p|0.125}I'm{nl|}going to get some pizza!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_hint_0_0
textArray.text: Y'know, {p|0.15}I heard somewhere that a{nl}{0} can{nl}be found {1}...

textArray.name: npc_rando_hint_1_0
textArray.text: Did you know, {P}?  {p|0.15}There's a{nl}{0} you{nl}can find {1}!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_hint_2_0
textArray.text: There's a place {1}{nl}where you can find a{nl}{0}.

textArray.name: npc_rando_hint_4_0
textArray.text: If you look {1},{nl}I heard you might find{nl}a {0}!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_2_0
textArray.text: Hey {P}, {p|0.1}I heard there's a{nl}secret around here!{nl}{p|0.3}{spd|0.06}...{spd|0.02}Don't remember where though.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_3_0
textArray.text: Darn, my node graph is out of{nl}date!  {p|0.25}Now I gotta go rebuild it...

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_4_0
textArray.text: Hey {P}, how does my{nl}papier-mch shell look?  {p|0.15}{nl}Pretty convincing, huh?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_7_0
textArray.text: I heard a rumor about some kind{nl}of... {p|0.15}{col|0302}shrine clip{col|0312}?  {p|0.2}And the number{nl}2011?  {p|0.3}Yeah, I don't get it either.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_8_0
textArray.text: Call me crazy, {P},{p|0.15} but I{nl}SWEAR I saw birds in the maze{nl}room!  {p|0.3}Shame I was half-asleep.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_11_0
textArray.text: What are you looking at?{nl}{nl}{p|0.35}...Can I look too?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_13_0
textArray.text: Sometimes it's nice to stop{nl}and snail the roses.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_15_0
textArray.text: Ever get the feeling that{nl}things aren't how they're meant{nl}to be?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_15_1
textArray.text: Like, somebody's moved all the furniture,{nl}{p|0.15}but it still fits right?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_15_2
textArray.text: {spd|0.04}...{nl}{p|0.15}{spd|0.02}Oh, that reminds me!  I wanted to{nl}buy a new houseplant today.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_16_0
textArray.text: Hey, {P}! I, uh{spd|0.06}...{nl}{nl}{p|0.2}...{spd|0.02}forgot what I was gonna say.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_17_0
textArray.text: I hope we can get that repair{nl}guy in soon.  {p|0.2}The fourth wall{nl}isn't gonna fix itself!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_18_0
textArray.text: Hey {P}, do you ever wonder{nl}what it means to be creative?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_18_1
textArray.text: Is it to create something no{nl}one has ever seen...

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_18_2
textArray.text: ...or is it to take something{nl}someone else made and make it{nl}subjectively better?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_19_0
textArray.text: I saw what looked like magic{nl}pancakes around here.{nl}{p|0.2}What's that all about??

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_20_0
textArray.text: III III IIIIIIIII III   III   IIIIIIIII  III IIIIII{nl}IIIIIIIII IIIIII  III   III   III III     III{nl}III III IIIIIIIII IIIIIIIII IIIIIIIII IIIIIIIII  III IIIIII

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_21_0
textArray.text: Would you believe me if I{nl}told you how sticky these walls{nl}are?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_22_0
textArray.text: Rumor has it that blobs are{nl}made out of discarded snail goo!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_23_0
textArray.text: I like the grass, {p|0.2}but it could{nl}use something extra...  {p|0.3}like a{nl}garnish!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_24_0
textArray.text: I am moving from this spot,{nl}{P}!{nl}{p|0.4}Just... {p|0.3}very slowly!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_25_0
textArray.text: I'm very good at snailing around.{nl}{p|0.15}Stay a while and watch me snail!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_26_0
textArray.text: Do you go to snurch on{nl}Sundays, {P}?{nl}{p|0.2}It's ok if you don't!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_28_0
textArray.text: You're really cool, {P}!!{nl}{p|0.25}I wish I could do all the things{nl}you do!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_29_0
textArray.text: Imagine a big green field where{nl}we could all munch on grass{nl}together...

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_30_0
textArray.text: {col|0201}Pink grass {col|0312}is rich in, uhh...{nl}{p|0.4}{spd|0.03}"P" for protein...?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_32_0
textArray.text: Let's trade items, {P}!{nl}{p|0.4}...Just kidding!  I don't have{nl}anything for you.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_33_0
textArray.text: Do you ever wonder who puts{nl}the breakable walls back after{nl}they're broken, {P}?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_34_0
textArray.text: How do you move so quickly,{nl}{P}?  {p|0.25}Is it a well-balanced{nl}diet?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_35_0
textArray.text: If you get through this next{nl}room really quick, {p|0.15}it'll look{nl}{eff|Wave}so cool{eff|None} in a replay!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_36_0
textArray.text: I know where the next big item{nl}you need is, {p|0.15}but I'm not{nl}telling!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_37_0
textArray.text: I want to be a biologist, {P}!{nl}{p|0.2}Look at all the neat{nl}creatures that live here!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_38_0
textArray.text: My favorite part of Snailiad is{nl}when they {S} all over the{nl}place.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_39_0
textArray.text: Hi!  {p|0.15}I'm the person who jumbles{nl}all the items around.  {p|0.2}It's hard{nl}work!!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_40_0
textArray.text: Check out my new OC, {P}!{nl}{p|0.2}They have a snake's head, and{nl}an elk's body!

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_41_0
textArray.text: I'm trying makeup, {P}!{nl}{p|0.2}Did you noticce my black outline?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_43_0
textArray.text: Do you think we can ever be{nl}friends with the blobs one day?

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_44_0
textArray.text: I could really go for some{nl}tuna right now.

textArray.name: npc_rando_flavor_46_0
textArray.text: /* Useless hints go here in the{nl}table so they can be picked{nl}randomly to replace certain{nl}text in randomizer mode.{nl}Multiworld game specific joke{nl}hints go elsewhere.{nl}See AP.cs L#69-L#420 */

textArray.name: ending_moon2
textArray.text:
Defeated, Moon Snail
          lost his powers

textArray.name: ending_moon3
textArray.text:
But could he ever become
      Sun Snail once more?

textArray.name: ending_sun2
textArray.text:
Moon Snail once again
     regained his light

textArray.name: ending_sun3
textArray.text:
and became the
  legendary Sun Snail

textArray.name: credits_entity_xdanond
textArray.text:
xdanond
(Drew several of
Flash Snaily's sprites!!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_adamatomic
textArray.text:
AdamAtomic
(Created Flixel, without which
Snaily game would not exist!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_auriplane
textArray.text:
Auriplane
(Author artist composer etc etc,
allowed this project to exist!!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_epsilon
textArray.text:
Epsilon
(Ported Snaily game to Unity along
with all the fresh bells
and whistles!!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_clarence
textArray.text:
clarence112
(Being infinitely better at coding
than I am, and also very cute)

textArray.name: credits_entity_broomie
textArray.text:
Broomietunes
(Wrote a bunch of new songs for
all of the new content!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_zettex
textArray.text:
Zettex
(Designed two of the new
playable characters!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_minervo
textArray.text:
Minervo Ionni
(Designed another playable
character and helped bounce even
more ideas!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_goldguy
textArray.text:
Goldguy40
(Drew a bunch of new tiles!)

textArray.name: credits_entity_discord
textArray.text:
The Snailiad Discord
(Testing, feedback, ideas,
and being patient
Seriously y'all are amazing _@_v)

textArray.name: credits_entity_xander
textArray.text:
They Call Me Xander
(Call him an entomologist the
way he discovers those bugs)

textArray.name: credits_entity_you
textArray.text:
And you


Because seriously, why not


All the other games
put "And You" in the credits
so I figure, "And You" must be
someone pretty cool


Thanks, And You!!

textArray.name: ending_promptOverwrite
textArray.text:
Would you like to overwrite
your previous best of
{0} (from ver. {1})?
